dcterms:creator: M. Yun
J. Honorio
D. Chattopadhyay
T. L. Berg
D. Samaras
dcterms:description: SBU is a two-person interaction dataset containing eight classes of human interactions including approaching, departing, pushing, kicking, punching, exchanging objects, hugging, and shaking hands. It consists of 282 short videos with 3D coordinates of 15 joints per person at each frame.
dcterms:title: SBU

dcterms:creator: A. Shahroudy
J. Liu
T. T. Ng
G. Wang
dcterms:description: NTU-RGB+D is a large-scale action dataset containing 56,578 skeleton sequences from 60 action classes, captured by 3 cameras at different angles. It includes 11 human interaction classes such as punch/slap, pat on the back, and handshaking.
dcterms:title: NTU-RGB+D

dcterms:creator: J. Liu
A. Shahroudy
M. Perez
G. Wang
L. Y. Duan
A. C. Kot
dcterms:description: NTU-RGB+D120 extends NTU-RGB+D with an additional 57,367 samples from 60 extra action classes, totaling 113,945 skeleton sequences from 120 action classes. It includes 15 additional human interaction classes.
dcterms:title: NTU-RGB+D120
